scripts.watch-with-tsify: watchify --debug --verbose --external react --external react-dom --plugin [ tsify ] --transform [ babelify --presets [ env react ] --extensions .tsx .ts ] ./src/index.tsx --outfile ./dist/bundle.js
scripts.watch-with-webstorm: watchify -d -v -x react -x react-dom -t [ babelify --presets [ env react ] ] ./src/index.jsx -o ./dist/bundle.js
scripts.start: npm run watch-with-tsify | npm run serve
scripts.build: browserify -v  -x react -x react-dom -p [ tsify ] -t [ babelify --presets [ env react ] --extensions .tsx .ts ] ./src/index.tsx -o ./dist/bundle.js
scripts.build1: browserify -v  -x react -x react-dom -t [ babelify --presets [ env react ] ] ./src/index.jsx -o ./dist/bundle.js
